description: The hardest part of the shrimp is to create a natural curvature for the back of shrimp. To do so, it is necessary to choose the round bamboo, slanted to select the size of the different sizes, then put together in order from small to large. The tail of the shrimp is small pieces of bamboo, thin, clawed, spread out. However, selecting and processing raw materials is still the most important. Selected bamboo will be soaked for 6 months continuously in the pond. Then the bamboo will be cut into several sections, Completed materials will be numbered and only be put into production after 6 months. It is thanks to this thoroughness that this bamboo shrimp have a very long life, meet the physical conditions when processing. It is made out of bamboo, fabric, steel wire, and hand paint. This hand made lobster measure around 37" overall lenght. the body width is around 3-1/2" and the width of the head is around 4-1/2". the length from the head to the tail is around 16". the distance from the right side leg to the left side leg is measured around 10". The distance of the Antenna at the tallest part measure from left to right is around 24". This is a very rare item and is hard to find somewhere else. it is a real art work. This hand crafted model lobster is for wall decorative. Just secure a nail into the wall and hang the lobster to the nail over the premade steel wire hook. This lobster require a three easy step assembly. buy from us CN1668, our lobster are made by the founder Nguyen Minh chau in Vietnam for long lasting quality, we sold over 150 in eBay history and over 50 in Amazon in the past 10 years, many copy out there may not be made in the same process that properly not soak for long lasting,
